definition: something a little different from others of the same type
details:
noun
- something a little different from others of the same type
= synonyms: variation
- the form in which a text, especially a printed book, is published
= example: the form in which a text, especially a printed book, is published
- an issue of a newspaper
= example: an issue of a newspaper
- all of the identical copies of something offered to the public at the same time
= example: all of the identical copies of something offered to the public at the same time
